name: Bn Facilities Bot
description: Manages bn-level facility bookings via telegram bot

SERVICE_ACCOUNT_INFO.description: Google service account JSON public key.

HEROKU_APP_URL.description: Heroku web app URL, include / at the end.

ADMIN_USERS.description: JSON array of Telegram user ids with admin rights. Format: [123456082, 227172364]

PORT.description: Port for Telegram webhook requests. Acceptable values: 443, 80, 88 or 8443.

COMMANDS_BOOKING.description: JSON serialised list of commands for managing bookings. Format: {"command": "description"}

COMMANDS_SETTING.description: JSON serialised list of commands for user settings. Format: {"command": "description"}

COMMANDS_ADMIN.description: JSON serialised list of admin-only commands. Format: {"command": "description"}

CHANNEL_USERNAME.description: Username of public telegram channel for logging bookings, exclude '@'.

CHANNEL_MUTED.description: Whether log channel updates are delivered silently (bool; case sensitive 'True' evaluates as True, all other values evaluate as False.)

ALT_FACILITIES.description: JSON serialised facility fallbacks. Format: {"Facility": "Alt Facility"}

FACILITIES.description: JSON array of bookable facilities. Format: ["Facility 1", "Facility 2", "Facility 3"]
